meanings.definition: The production of raw silk from silkworms.
meanings.sent1: Sericulture involves raising silkworms to make silk.
meanings.sent2: Many countries rely on sericulture for their silk production.
meanings.sent3: The sericulture business can be quite lucrative if managed well.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, sericulture is the thread that holds everything together.
meanings.sent5: Learning about sericulture can open up a whole new world of possibilities.

meanings.definition: The cultivation of silkworms for the production of silk.
meanings.sent1: Farmers engage in sericulture to grow silkworms for silk.
meanings.sent2: Sericulture requires careful attention to the needs of the silkworms.
meanings.sent3: Some people find the process of sericulture fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent4: The art of sericulture weaves a delicate web of nature and industry.
meanings.sent5: Silkworms play a crucial role in the ancient practice of sericulture.
